title: Best of The Program | Guests: Donald Trump Jr., Sharyl Attkisson, & Steven Crowder | 9/30/20
description:
BlazeTV’s Steven Crowder joins after his debate livestream with his thoughts on the carnage and a preview of his upcoming rally in Michigan to hold Gov. Whitmer accountable for her terrible handling of the coronavirus. Investigative reporter Sharyl Attkisson reviews the debate and news that Obama was briefed in 2016 about Hillary Clinton possibly planning to tie Trump to Russia. The New York Times claims some of the biggest election misinformation is on the subjects of mail-in voting and George Soros. Donald Trump Jr. argues what Biden got away with at the debate.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
